6
You will never want to sleep on a bed like that.
Inches of dust and spider webs covered the bed, you won't even touch
it unless there's something strange about it.
But it seems like there's someone lying under the quilt.
You lift the quilt to check out.
There's a 1:1 Super Mario doll holding a CD in his hand.
## 3
Fetch the CD and go back.
